description: CLI tool to interact with MeetGeek API for retrieving meeting details, transcripts, summaries, and highlights

stories.title: Project setup and API client
stories.description: Create package.json, set up project structure, and implement MeetGeek API client based on the MCP server reference

stories.title: CLI scaffold with commander
stories.description: Set up CLI entry point with commander.js, help text, and version command

stories.title: List meetings command
stories.description: Implement 'meetgeek list' to show recent meetings with title, date, duration
acceptance: meetgeek list shows meetings in table format

stories.title: Show meeting details command
stories.description: Implement 'meetgeek show <id>' to display meeting metadata
acceptance: Shows: title, date, participants, duration, recording URL

stories.title: Get summary command
stories.description: Implement 'meetgeek summary <id>' to show AI-generated meeting summary
acceptance: Includes key points and action items

stories.title: Get transcript command
stories.description: Implement 'meetgeek transcript <id>' to show meeting transcript

stories.title: Get highlights command
stories.description: Implement 'meetgeek highlights <id>' to show key moments

stories.title: Natural language search
stories.description: Implement 'meetgeek ask <query>' to search meetings using natural language
acceptance: meetgeek ask 'what did we discuss about the budget?'
Uses local processing or simple keyword matching
